name: subscribo/apiclientauth
description: Subscribo Authentication package for API Client

suggest.laravel/framework: This package have been developed to work with The Laravel Framework 5.0
suggest.illuminate/foundation: (already contained in laravel/framework) - If using AuthenticatesAndRegistersUsersTrait
suggest.illuminate/session: (already contained in laravel/framework) - If using AuthenticatesAndRegistersUsersTrait (recommended version ~5.0)
